title: Hanes Men's Ultimate Sweatshirt, Heavyweight Fleece Hoodie, Cotton Sweatshirt for Men
description: ULTIMATE HEAVYWEIGHT - Made from soft, plush 9.7-oz. heavyweight fleece for cozy warmth.
HOODED - Jersey-lined hood with drawcord helps block out wind and chill.
TIMELESS - Classic men's pullover hoodie never goes out of style.
POUCH POCKET - A roomy pouch pocket provides the perfect storage place for small essentials.
TAG FREE - Tagless interior provides a comfortable finish.
QUALITY FABRIC - Crafted from a cotton-rich fleece fabric for complete and total comfort.

Featuring our warmest fleece, this Hanes® Ultimate® men's heavyweight hoodie is sure to become a wardrobe staple. Crafted from a cotton-rich 9.7-oz. fabric that maintains its softness, this ultra-versatile men’s pullover sweatshirt is great on its own or layered. The Hanes quality you expect, you'll love the classic ribbed cuffs and relaxed waistband. Say good-bye to annoying tags, thanks to this Tagless® interior. Finished with a roomy hood, this men's sweatshirt features a front kangaroo pocket, perfect for storing small essentials. Pair it with your favorite sweats or jeans for effortlessly cool style.
